title: Enhanced light absorption by ambient brown carbon aerosols in the eastern Himalayas
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,782-801
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00021H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
B. S. Arun, Mukunda M. Gogoi, Dhananjay Kumar Deshmukh, Prashant Hegde, Suresh Kumar Reddy Boreddy, Arup Borgohain, S. Suresh Babu
This study investigates the light absorption properties of organic aerosols in PM10 collected at a high-altitude location (2700 m a.s.l.) in the eastern Himalayas from March 2019 to February 2020.
